metadata.title: spring-expression: Denial of service when processing a specially crafted Spring Expression Language expression (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the Spring framework package. A maliciously crafted Spring Expression Language (SePL) may trigger uncontrolled CPU usage, leading to a denial of service in the application consuming it. To be considered vulnerable, one application has to evaluate user-supplied SpEL expressions.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
org.springframework/spring-expression is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
